about_the_game:
Ilíada Espacial 2 is a Space Shooter with RPG elements, where you must defeat waves of enemies to advance in the adventure. In this game, you can't shoot like crazy, because your gun will overheat, paralysing your ship and leaving you at the mercy of enemies!

Before each mission, you must go through a workshop where you must improve your ship by paying with the loot obtained from defeated enemies. Decide wisely if you want to improve your attack, the ship's resistance or learn new skills that will help you in your survival.

You can hire a mercenary to help you if a mission is difficult for you, but be careful, because, apart from the fact that their help is not free, if they are killed, you will lose their help for the rest of the game!

In fact, this game is not going to be easy at all, but don't be sad if you lose! The game will save your records, and in your next game it will reward you with additional resources with which to finally throw the villains away.

The story takes place on the planet Sivinina. There has been a civil war orchestrated by the evil Pimolot, who has not taken well having placed 2nd in the elections and has encouraged his forces to take up arms to take control of the planet by force.

The Nebula Patrol has been contacted to help Sivinina's army defeat the coup plotters and rescue the legitimate government.

Your mission will be to find and defeat Pimolot, liberating along the way the territories that have fallen under his iron fist.

You can play with a keyboard or a controller. The game recognizes both Xbox, PlayStation and Nintendo Switch controllers.
